title: Venom Dart Trap
summaries: The Venom Dart Trap is a trap that fires a venomous dart when triggered via wire. It is a direct upgrade to the Dart Trap.

It has a cooldown period of 3 1/3 seconds between firings. The dart deal 60 / <linked>120</linked> / <linked>180</linked> damage and inflict <linked>Acid Venom</linked> for 5 / <linked>10</linked> / <linked>12.5</linked> seconds to players (30 damage and 5 seconds of Acid Venom to <linked>NPCs</linked>, <linked>enemies</linked>, and <linked>critters</linked>).
Venom Dart Traps can be rotated 90° with a <linked>hammer</linked>.
Venom Dart Traps do not generate naturally, and can only be obtained via crafting.

statistics.Sell: 60 SC
